attributes.action: Criminalise threatening behaviour towards British military personnel.
attributes.additional_details:
We see our brave military personnel being aggressively targeted in public too often.

Threatening, abusive and insulting behaviour is absolutely unacceptable in a civilised nation.

We have legislation which prevents antagonism based on racist & religious grounds. Our heroic military personnel deserve equal protection.

We need a robust & moral stand against any individual who openly attacks our Armed Forces ~ verbally; through signs or over the Internet.

The aim is to secure primary legislation (a full range of offences akin to religiously aggravated offences) with stiff penalties to deter & incarcerate people with intolerant attitudes towards our military personnel.

Our Armed Forces are a significant part of our heritage & proud history. They have protected our freedom for centuries. They deserve our support.
